128 
129 #define metal_for_each_page_size_up(ps) \
130  for ((ps) = &_metal.page_sizes[0]; \
131  (ps) <= &_metal.page_sizes[_metal.num_page_sizes - 1]; \
132  (ps)++)
133 
134 #define metal_for_each_page_size_down(ps) \
135  for ((ps) = &_metal.page_sizes[_metal.num_page_sizes - 1]; \
136  (ps) >= &_metal.page_sizes[0]; \
137  (ps)--)
138 
139 #endif
140

142 }
143 #endif
